item.title: Trump pauses oil exec summit to peek at White House ballroom's progress
item.description: President Donald Trump paused his White House meeting with oil executives Friday to check construction progress on a new privately funded ballroom.

item.title: Johnson meets with Muslim man who confronted, disarmed Bondi Beach attacker
item.description: Ahmed Al-Ahmed, the Muslim hero who confronted and disarmed one of the antisemitic gunmen at the Bondi Beach Hanukkah event meets House Speaker Johnso...

item.title: Reporter's Notebook: Progressives eye shutdown leverage to rein in ICE, Venezuela operations
item.description: Democrats face internal split over using funding deadline to defund ICE following Minnesota shooting, as Congress races toward January 30 shutdown.

item.title: Pritzker challengers demand audit, pitch ‘DOGE for Illinois’ – point to Walz-style failures
item.description: Two Republicans challenging Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker demand fraud audits after Minnesota scandal, citing alleged vulnerabilities in state programs.

item.title: House Dem backs the idea of reining in DHS funding in wake of ICE-involved shooting in Minnesota
item.description: Rep. Julie Johnson, D-Texas, expressed support for Democratic lawmakers reining in DHS funding in light of the ICE-involved shooting in Minneapolis.
